channel.title: Painting on Van Wert 4H Model Railroad club
channel.description: Recent content in Painting on Van Wert 4H Model Railroad club

item.title: Basic HTML Elements
item.description: The main purpose of this article is to make sure that all basic HTML Elements are decorated with CSS so as to not miss any possible elements when creating new themes for Hugo.

item.title: Painting & Styling Backdrop
item.description: Materials Needed: Backdrop Material: A large sheet of foam board, Masonite, or another rigid material that fits the size of your module. Alternatively, you can paint directly on the module backdrop if it’s made of a suitable material. Paints: Acrylic paints are recommended for their versatility and quick drying time. Colors for the sky, mountains, hills, and any other elements you want to include.
